text: Onsay ɓe bugitii e ɲalaande goo. Ɓay wonii nden ɲalaande nde ɓe haldi hewtii, ɗuuɗuɓe ari ka makko ɓuri aranun. E nder ko o sifotoo kon, tawi himo seeditaade fii *laamu Alla ngun, awa kadi himo rewrude e Sariya Muusaa on e defte annabaaɓe ɓen fii holnugol ɓe fii Iisaa, ɗun waɗi gila bimbi haa kiikiiɗe.
